## Data Camp

Please go through and complete the following module

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("square", fill = "steelblue"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-square", fill = "steelblue"))

dcico <- as.character("/logos/dc_small.png{width=20px}")

dc_schedule <-  
  read_csv(here::here("content", "dc.csv"),
           show_col_types = FALSE) %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
  mutate(Required = case_when(
    Required == "checked" ~ as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-circle", fill = "#428bca", height = "15px")),
    Required == "unchecked" ~ as.character(fontawesome::fa("times-circle", fill = "#d9534f", height = "15px"))
              )) %>%
  mutate(across(everything(), as.character)) %>%
  filter(Group == 6) %>% #CHANGE HERE
  select(-Group, -Chapters_wide, -`Due by_short`) %>%
  rename(`Due by` = `Due by_long`) %>%
  rename(Chapters = Chapters_long)  %>%
 # filter_all(any_vars(!is.na(.))) %>% 
  mutate(
    across(everything(), ~replace_na(.x, ""))
    ) %>%
  select_if(~!all(is.na(.))) %>%
  mutate(Link = str_replace_all(Link, "hyper",
                                paste0("[![",dcico,"](/logos/dc-ico.png 'Slack Icon'){width=20px}]",
                           "(https://www.datacamp.com/){target='_blank'}"
  ))) %>%
  select(-Exploration, -Link)
  
```
